Title: addMilliseconds
Description: Adds a specified number of milliseconds to a date with time or a string-encoded date with time.
date_time: Date with time to add specified number of milliseconds to. DateTime/DateTime64, String.num: Number of milliseconds to add. (U)Int*, Float*.
Returns date_time plus num milliseconds. DateTime64.
Examples: WITH    toDateTime('2024-01-01 00:00:00') AS date_time,    '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AS date_time_stringSELECT    addMilliseconds(date_time, 1000) AS add_milliseconds_with_date_time,    addMilliseconds(date_time_string, 1000) AS add_milliseconds_with_date_time_string
